row.name: UC4RB_WAS_MODULES#
row.xui: <text alt="1" enabled="1" fill="b" focus="0" id="UC4RB_WAS_MODULESs.00" inputassistance="0" len="" multiline="1" multilineIcon="0" nl="1" regex="" separator=";" showaspassword="0" text="Modules" tooltip="Specifies Modules separated by new line to be mapped to Target Servers. Modules and Target Servers are separated by ';' and defined as follows: Module Description; Module URI; Target Servers where 'Module Description' and 'Module URI' must match what is in the EAR file. 'Target Servers' is the list of 'cell, node, server' or 'cell, cluster' entries that are separated by ';' For example, 'Increment EJB module; Increment.jar,META-INF/ejb-jar.xml; cell1,node1,server1; cell2,node2,server2'" upper="0" required="0"><oninputassistant><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptname|@id"/><command request="_internal" target="_view" targetaction="setAttribute" targetparam="promptvalue|@value"/><command owner="_promptsetcontainer" owneraction="getData" request="getpromptinputassistance" target="_chainwindow"/></oninputassistant><properties><entry listparam="C" name="reference" reftype="STATIC">UC_DATATYPE_STRING</entry><entry name="text">Modules</entry><entry name="multiselect">0</entry><entry name="separator">;</entry><entry name="len"/><entry name="quotes"/><entry name="id">UC4RB_WAS_MODULESs.00</entry><entry name="inputassistance">0</entry><entry name="enabled">0</entry><entry name="upper">0</entry><entry name="focus">0</entry><entry name="showaspassword">0</entry><entry name="tooltip">Specifies Modules separated by new line to be mapped to Target Servers. Modules and Target Servers are separated by ';' and defined as follows: Module Description; Module URI; Target Servers where 'Module Description' and 'Module URI' must match what is in the EAR file. 'Target Servers' is the list of 'cell, node, server' or 'cell, cluster' entries that are separated by ';' For example, 'Increment EJB module; Increment.jar,META-INF/ejb-jar.xml; cell1,node1,server1; cell2,node2,server2'</entry><entry name="customfield"/><entry name="xmlkey"/><entry name="xmlpath"/><entry name="modifiable">1</entry><entry name="multiline">1</entry><entry name="multilineIcon">0</entry><entry name="regex"/><entry name="required">1</entry><entry name="resetable">1</entry><entry name="initvalue"/><entry name="onchangereset"/></properties></text>
